topics.body:
Okay so here's something I don't get.
[spoiler]Why can't Lopmon digivolve? Siuchun had a digivice and they have multiple copies of the evolution card. So what's stopping her from using it?[/spoiler]

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/548950bd6368726735ed0300#post_548950bd6368726735ed0300
Cause they removed her ability to digivolve completely.
